sense.name: Find out or determine, perhaps after a calculation or investigation.
sense.examples: We use multiplication to ascertain the product of two numbers. I want to ascertain whether she speaks French. Chuck ascertained the pipe's pressure before opening the valve.

sense.name: Make sure of.
sense.commentary: Note: Usually phrased as some sort of imperative.
sense.examples: Ascertain that the curtains are closed. We must ascertain the good quality of our products. Ascertain that dinner has been prepared.
